project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and conditions
Implement the function to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching and displaying functions
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
